trans-unit.source: Provides the functionality for a control to act as a parent for other controls.
The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> classe e implemente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementação é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: Implement this interface in classes that you want to parent a collection of controls.
trans-unit.target: Implemente esta interface nas classes que você deseja para o pai de uma coleção de controles.

trans-unit.source: The members of this interface allow you to activate a child control, or determine which control is currently active.
trans-unit.target: Os membros desta interface permitem que você ativar um controle filho, ou a determinar qual controle está ativo no momento.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> takes a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> as a parameter and activates the specified control.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe, <see cref="M:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl(System.Windows.Forms.Control)" /> leva um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> como um parâmetro e ativa o controle especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl" /> property activates or retrieves the control that is active.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl" /> propriedade ativa ou recupera o controle que está ativo.

trans-unit.source: In most common scenarios, you do not need to directly implement this interface.
trans-unit.target: Em cenários mais comuns, você não precisa diretamente implementar essa interface.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you create a Windows Control Library project, Visual Studio generates an initial class for you.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você criar um projeto de biblioteca de controle do Windows, o Visual Studio gera uma classe inicial para você.

trans-unit.source: That class inherits from the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> class, and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> implements <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl" /> for you.
trans-unit.target: Que classe herda o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> classe, e <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.UserControl" /> implementa <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl" /> para você.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> being activated.
Activates a specified control.
<see langword="true" /> if the control is successfully activated; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> classe e implemente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementação é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, this method activates the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe, este método ativará especificado <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" />.

trans-unit.source: The control must be a child of the container control.
trans-unit.target: O controle deve ser um filho do controle de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the control that is active on the container control.
The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> that is currently active on the container control.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.Control" /> que está ativo no momento no controle de contêiner.

trans-unit.source: The following example inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> class and implements the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir herda o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ScrollableControl> classe e implemente o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl> interface.

trans-unit.source: Implementation is added to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Implementação é adicionada para o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> propriedade e o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.IContainerControl.ActivateControl%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a class, this property activates or retrieves the active control on the container control.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementada em uma classe, essa propriedade ativa ou recupera o controle ativo no controle de contêiner.
